amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for any State or city that is not in compliance with Federal immigration laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. Black.
